feature.greeting_1: My name's Anders and welcome to my portfolio website!
feature.greeting_2: I hope this gives you a greater indication of my experience, projects and personality.

about.head: About Me
about.about_1: I'm currently attending Queen's University in a program that blends advanced mathematics and computer engineering. I'm in my final year after recently completing a year-long internship at Intel.
about.about_4: While I go to school in Ontario, I plan to move to British Columbia when I graduate.

info.about_2: I love the outdoors, travel and going on adventures with my friends! I'm passionate about rock climbing, skiing, hiking, mountain biking and surfing!
info.about_3: Some of my ideal trip goals are to travel to South America and Southeast Asia, get my scuba diving license and summit Mt. Denali in Alaska.

global.subscriber_confirmation: Thank you for subscribing! We will contact you shortly.
